p.k: Join Ireland's Customs teams as they, with the help of the Irish police, try to stop organised smugglers from bringing drugs, cars and even exotic animals into the country
Hotel LA The SWAT team must protect a hotel full of civilians when a joint task force mission with the LAPD Gang Division goes badly wrong
84% Calculon 2.0 Celebrated robot actor Calculon is given a second stab at stardom when Bender and Fry take extreme measures to bring him back from the dead
84% Assie Come Home When Bender is 'bot jacked' and left with just his eyes and mouth, it falls to Fry and Leela to track down their pal's stolen body parts
Mother's Darlings Most animals are born defenceless, but under the protection and guidance of their mothers, they soon become masters of their own universes
The More The Merrier Growing up with brothers and sisters makes life a little sweeter, and time spent together helps these baby animals explore and learn
Join Dr Alison Cronin's team at the Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Dorset as they rehabilitate abused primates and support overseas projects to protect
Join Dr Alison Cronin's team at the Monkey World Ape Rescue Centre in Dorset as they rehabilitate abused primates and support overseas projects to protect
Documentary series from New Zealand following the madness and mayhem faced by intrepid officers as they pull over motorists for a variety of suspected offences
Documentary series from New Zealand following the madness and mayhem faced by intrepid officers as they pull over motorists for a variety of suspected offences
Join Ireland's Customs teams as they, with the help of the Irish police, try to stop organised smugglers from bringing drugs, cars and even exotic animals into the country
68% Commitment Issues The team investigate the murder of a naval warfare engineer at a poetry event. Callen asks Nell to help in a worldwide search for Anna
68% The Circle Anna returns with a dangerous warning for Callen, who must work with an archenemy to bust an underground trafficking ring
Hoa 'inea (Misery Loves Company) Steve McGarrett and the team investigate a double murder. They also revisit their Valentine's Day disasters
Ke Koa Lokomaika'I (The Good Soldier) McGarrett partners with a young man whose only friend has been murdered. Plus, the FBI question Danny's mother
Stigma When their former unit leader Buck goes off the grid, Hondo and the team confront their emotional difficulties as they race to save him
84% Blindsided Family pride is at stake as Luke decides to run against Manny for class president. Meanwhile, Cam takes in a star high school football player
84% Weathering Heights Phil is invited to appear in a real estate segment for the local news and gets to meet his weatherman hero, Rainer Shine (Nathan Fillion)
Homer's Triple Bypass: Years of over-indulgence finally take their toll on Homer, who discovers that he needs a triple heart bypass
84% Calculon 2.0 Celebrated robot actor Calculon is given a second stab at stardom when Bender and Fry take extreme measures to bring him back from the dead
84% Assie Come Home When Bender is 'bot jacked' and left with just his eyes and mouth, it falls to Fry and Leela to track down their pal's stolen body parts
I Love Lisa: When Ralph, the school nerd, fails to receive a Valentine's Card, Lisa gives him one out of pity - and he falls instantly in love with her
Duffless: How will Homer cope with a 30 day abstinence from his favourite drink? Meanwhile, Lisa pits her brother against a hamster in her latest scientific experiment
Last Exit To Springfield: Homer stands up for what he believes in. Featuring the guest voice of Dr Joyce Brothers as herself
New & Exclusive. Phantom Menaces Supergirl makes a new ally, while Lena and Lex battle for control of Luthor Corp
Karl Comes Home Mr Pilkington is back in Blighty and reunites with Ricky Gervais and Stephen Merchant to reflect on his experiences
The comedian and Mock the Week star heads to Brighton Dome for a huge stand-up gig as part of his sell-out 2009 tour, which played to over 125,000 people
New & Exclusive. Bad Manners Malcolm and Ainsley both race to find the killer in the 'Debutante Slayings', but Ainsley's persistence has Malcolm worried
New & Exclusive. Golden Lancehead + Venom + Pole Vault + Blood + Baggage: Mac and a friend's secret experimental cancer treatment is stolen as criminals ransack their lab
New & Exclusive. Meat - The Legends With Spooner on board, Ava hopes her special powers will lead them to the aliens that are spread out across the timeline
The Road Crime Unit make a surprise discovery after pulling over a car, and dog handler Steve pursues a suspect. Meanwhile, the Tactical Aid Group raid a flat
Cut through the yellow tape and accompany officers up and down the country who work the toughest shift of all: the night shift
